reviews.review: It has many cons but the pros outweigh it by a thousand

Greed by deadlight

I came out from work to play the game I been playing the last couple of weeks to find out the prices went 3 times higher. Before that, a 50 mb update came out that took a few hours to install (obviously a 50 mb update needs to rewrite the entire 50 gb of files).

To the devolpers defense, during the 5 years anniversary (the first time that I played the game) there were lots of obnoxious comments from the developers at the loading screens, claiming that their game was extremely succesfull so there were clearly signs of predatory practices. Besides being cocky and greedy (there are 3 different currencies, an insane amount of pay to win, grind, constant advertisement for their store etc) and sharing the ambitious of modern AAA titles such as paid skins, battlepass, in game currency to buy non licenced characters etc, lacks the budget of a AAA title. Even though the game is SUPER SUCCESFULL, with crossplay, the game manages to take a few minutes to find a match (only 1 game mode), peer to peer connection and on top of that it looks like a 360 title.

The only thing missing was to increase the prices to match the greed of EA$, Bugisoft and AC$tivision.
Nice job congratz! I was about to buy EVERYTHING from the store this weekend and instead, I'm going to by DOOM entire collection, fallout 4 goty and skyrim special edition instead (which amounts for around the prior prices of the licenced characters of dead by deadlight, doom eternal goty cost the same as 1 dlc pack now!).

Take this review as a pallet to predator pratices. To dbd developers: take into consideartion that I have to also pay 65 % of taxes on top of the prices that you publish!

The game has a bit of a rough learning curve to start, but once you learn the basics, it is a great game of cat and mouse!

P.S. One of the best ways to learn the game is to see it from the killer's perspective, either by playing killer or watching overs play killer. Knowing what the killers see will help even survivor players improve.

Dead by Daylight has an amazing concept, and good controls; I have no issue there. The issue is BHVR, they don't listen to player feedback at all, repeatedly over-nerf and over-buff things nobody even asks for, and every new chapter makes the game unplayable for console for a period of time. 

Overall, Dead By Daylight is a fun horror game that fits a unique playerbase, and i would highly recommend playing with friends. Solo Queue can be tolerable, but barely. The perk system is based heavily on currency grinding, and the playerbase is incredibly toxic, but the game is absolutely worth it if you can get it on sale. 

TLDR: DBD needs work, but with friends its 100% worth it.
สนุกมากครับ ถึงจะโดนเซอร์บูลลี่บ่อยๆ แต่โดยรวมถือว่าน่าเล่นครับ

Ayo what up G this game sucks.

Pros: This game offers plenty of killers to fit anyone's play-style, all while offering a COMPLETELY different playing experience when playing as a survivor. As the killer things can be exhilarating. But as a survivor things can be very tense and even get your adrenaline going. Behaviour (the devs) regularly read and respond to comments on their social media pages and it's much appreciated. They also include plenty of in-game skins and outfits.

Cons: Pre-made lobbies of survivors aka SWF's can really kill your experience as a killer. Theere are also incredibly skilled players that like to rub it in your face if you cannot keep up. And like any community there are always toxic members who can only see through their own lens, and can't relate to anyone else. Also you'll get really toxic Killer players that will facecamp (look this up), which will basically end your match if you are the hooked one (honestly, you might as well kys in-game and start a new match if this is happening to you as the killer knows what they're doing is wrong, they just don't care).


Overall: 7/10 

Implement a facecamp penalty for the killer player. Release more skins for your licensed characters like Cheryl and Leon. More in-game events would be nice too.

Ogółem produkcja opisana jest jako horror, mimo iż przez większość mojego czasu w tej grze nie bałem się ani trochę to zdarzały się momenty w, których trudno było nie popuścić xD. 
Reasumując gra jest bardzo przyjemna z momentami strachu a zatem mocne 8/10.
:3

Das Spielprinzip ist gut und wenn man es mit Freunden spielt ist das echt ein super Spiel.
Jedoch als Anfänger ist das Spiel echt schwer.
Die ersten drei, vier Runden wird man noch mit Gleichgesinnten reingesteckt. 
Aber aufgrund der geringen Spieleranzahl bekommt man danach auch gerne mal Mitspieler/Gegner die doch ein gutes Stück höher im Rang sind als man selbst. 
Als Survivor kannst du dich quasi direkt mit dem Haken anfreunden, sobald dich ein Killer sieht schaffst du es gar nicht zu entkommen.
Ist nicht jede Runde der Fall, aber dennoch etwas unfair.
Ein anderer Aspekt das Spiel ist nichts für Leute mit dem Hang zur Gefühlsexplosion.
Der Killer kann manchmal einen echt auf die Palme bringen, nur damit dieser den Spaß seines Lebens hat.

Im großen Ganzen macht es riesen Spaß mit Freunden zu spielen (zudem hat man auch verlässlichere Partner), aber für diejenigen unter euch die keine Freunde haben sucht euch welche oder ihr werdet wenn ihr keine geduldige und ruhige Person seid ziemlich schnell das Spiel beenden wollen. 


PS: Last die Finger von den DLC´s wenn ihr es wirklich es nur ausprobieren wollt.
